changeSet.author: patrick_schmitz
changeSet.createView: SELECT bsp.id ,IFNULL(bsp.uuid, '') AS uuid ,bsp.fk_object_type_id ,bsp.fk_bracket_id ,IFNULL(bsp."searchPattern", '') AS "searchPattern" ,bsp.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,bsp.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM "bracket_searchPattern" bsp ;
changeSet.comment: Quote fields with mixed lower and upper. Used objects: v_bracket_searchPattern_SearchInterface Phabricator tasks: T303
